sermons.title: (Guidelines) Is the Bible Important
sermons.description: Beginning with an affirmation that ALL of the Bible is the Word of God, McGee recalls how he had to mature from reading it piece meal to reading it through. He exhorts us to read the Bible through all 66 books. In fact, this was the mission for His radio ministry, “Through the Bible” in which he took listeners through every chapter and almost every verse of the Bible over the course of 5 years.
